Lesson1 What is CAR?

Overview

  • What is CAR?
  • Features of CAR
  • Programming Paradigm of CAR

Quick Tutorial

Component-oriented Programming

Component-oriented programming allows the components to be loaded dynamically at run time. Thus different components provided by different developers can call each other to communicate. Component are interchangeable at runtime. They use a standard protocol for the communication among components. The component technology is typically represented by COM technology.

What is CAR?

The Component Assembly Runtime(CAR) technology is developed by Kortide with independent intellectual property rights of component technology.

It is a component-oriented programming model and also a programming idea, and it is described by special standards divided in two parts: specification and implementation. The specification part tells how to define the components and how to communicate among components. It does not depend on any particular language or operating system. Following the specification, any language can be used. Thus, CAR can be implemented in many ways. Elastos operating system implements the CAR core services.

CAR components provide service using interface, component interface needs the metadata to describe the component so that other users can know how to use the service. Metadata describe the relationship between services and calls. With this description, calling between different components becomes possible, and members of the long-range, inter-process communication can be properly carried out. The major solved problems by CAR component technology are: component from different sources can interoperate; components upgrade but affect no other component; component is independent of the programming language; transparency of component operating environment.

CAR component technology simplifies the development process. After writing a car file, CAR compiler can generate the basic code framework for developers. Developers finish component to provide service for the client on this basis, and effectively improve the speed and quality.

The programming idea with CAR is the essence technology in Elastos, it runs through the entire technology system implementation. In Elastos both the operating system kernel and the component library provided by Elastos platform are implemented using CAR technology. Closely integrated of the operating system kernel with CAR technology runtime environment can provide strong support to Elastos architecture.

As a component-oriented programming language, CAR is only responsible for the framework, and the specific implementation logic will be achieved by the C/C++ or other programming language.

CAR and COM

CAR component technology derives from COM technology, and it was compatible with COM at first. It deleted some old rules in COM and provided better extensions compared to COM.

Now, CAR has developed a lotand has its own grammar instead of .cdl file. It also has its own tools such as the CAR compiler instead of using MS IDL Compiler, and it has a metadata description which allows components to describe themselves. It is not compatible with COM anymore.

CAR in Elastos

Elastos platform provides a set of API and services that meet CAR standards. It has helped CAR programming model to improve over the years. At the same time, CAR component technology simplifies the development process for the Elastos platform. The CAR compiler can generate the framework code from the car files written by users, and developers just have to fill in the code to implement the CAR service.

CAR provides ways to develop dynamic applications (plug-in system â€“ add or remove parts of code on demand on the mobile phone). It also allows applications to be updated periodically, pushed to end users or pulled automatically.

Features of CAR

  • Metadata: self-described
  • Dynamically linked at run-time
  • Component-oriented Programming, Binary inherit
  • Cross-platform
  • Java can access CAR as native code more easily in a controllable way.
  • Developing software in multi-language, such as Java, Script, Html, C/C++.
  • Compatibility support: reuse your existing code.

Programming Paradigm

  • Seamlessly Support for traditionally C/C++ programming
  • Elastos program execute entry: ElastosMain
  • Elastos component services
  • Callback on Events Mechanism
  • Regime Programming
  • Generic Programming
  • Reflection
